title: nacka romba nacka lyrics Masilamani song lyrics
stanzas:

Nacka Romba Nacka kadhaluku kodu pota nacka

kadhal Enbadhu naikutti pola

kadhal endraley yarum paarkamal kadhil poovaipadhao

Thaana nanana shoka shoka

shoka romba shoka andha kodu mela roadu pota shoka

Engum nanjam melugai pola urugudhu urugudhu mella
Adhiril irundhum thozhaivil irukum avasthayai enavendru solla
Ayoo indha payan dhan kadhal loosu anaane
Aandhai pola rathiriyil thookamindri ponaane
kadhal adangaadhadhu theriyadhaaaa....
Aalai kavilkamale pogadhaaa...

Nacka Romba Nacka kadhaluku kodu pota nacka
shoka romba shoka andha kodu mela roadu pota shoka

Engo irudhu inge nulaidhu ullangalai kavardhida vandhaal

Kiliye unnai ketkaamal kootil Kolam potaane
Kannai moodi paduthaalum kanavil unnai thotaane
Engum poovaasangal thandhanee .....
Nenjil Ther polave ninrane .....

shoka romba shoka andha kodu mela roadu pota shoka

kadhal Enbadhu naikutti pola
